title: Test Python Code for Quarto
text:
Code
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
theta = 2* np.pi *r 
fig, ax = plt.subplots(subplot_kw={'projection': 'polar'})
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()

title: Fahim Ahmed
text:
Hi, my name is Fahim Ahmed and I am a Ph.D. candidate studying Civil Engineering (Dissertation on Transportation Engr.) at University of South Carolina.
I am interested in the topic of freight system performance, vehicle routing, and traffic safety. Currently, I am working with Dr. Nathan Huynh to develop a solution for truck (re-)routing under disruptive environment in a distribution network.

title: Welcome To My Blog
